Sentencas: This paper reports the performance of a solid oxide fuel cell with yttria-stabilized zirconia (YSZ) electrolyte, NiYSZ anode and (La0.8Sr0.2)(0.95)MnO3 (LSM) cathode or RuO2-YSZ cathode using air oxidant or a CO2 oxidant and a H-2 fuel with 3% H2O at 600-800 degrees C.
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cell using a H2 fuel/CO2 oxidant gas system

Sentencas: The power density was higher for air oxidant than for a CO2 oxidant.
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cell using a H2 fuel/CO2 oxidant gas system

Sentencas: The measured power density was associated with the reduction of CO2 gas to solid carbon for the RuO2-YSZ cathode.
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cell using a H2 fuel/CO2 oxidant gas system

Sentencas: In the cell with the LSM cathode, a CO2 oxidant was reduced to the mixed state of CO molecules and solid carbon.
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cell using a H2 fuel/CO2 oxidant gas system

Sentencas: The reactivity of O-2 or CO2 molecules in their mixed oxidant gas system for the YSZ cell with the LSM cathode changed drastically at 50-70 vol% CO2 in the O-2-N-2-CO2 gas system.
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cell using a H2 fuel/CO2 oxidant gas system

Sentencas: It is possible to produce an electric power and to reduce CO2 gas into solid carbon at the same time during the operation of a solid oxide fuel cells using a CO2 oxidant.
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cell using a H2 fuel/CO2 oxidant gas system
